overview: Paul Thomas spins a tangled tale of eros and intrigue, with four interwoven couples, the Hungarian mob, an accountant, an escort and a cop named Danny. Join international superstar Dasha in one of her final adult appearances, in what will surely be one of Paul Thomas' most awarded films. The Eight Sin. The first seven were deadly. The Eight is dead on.
tagline: The Skies Have Never Been Friendlier
title: The 8th Sin
